articles.title: Meta's 'mega' ban in India: Why content from WhatsApp, Instagram, Facebook was banned and removed - Gadgets Now
articles.description: Meta-owned WhatsApp banned millions of accounts in India. In fact, the banned number for WhatsApp set a record. Instagram and Facebook removed millions of posts. The company announced this in its monthly compliance report for April 2023, filed under the IT Ru…
articles.content: Between April 1 and April 30, 7,452,500 WhatsApp accounts were banned. WhatsApp usually bans accounts based on complaints it receives from users in India via the grievance mechanisms on its platform.… [+113 chars]
